## Name

config

## Synopsis

```sh
$ config [--remove] <domain> <group> [key] [value]
```

## Description

Show or modify values in the configuration files through ConfigServer.

## Options

-   `-r`, `--remove`: Remove group or key

## Arguments

-   `domain`: Config domain
-   `group`: Group name
-   `key`: Key name
-   `value`: Value to write
